means: 同时发生的，同时存在的

sentence.Network_en: There were several simultaneous attacks by the rebels.
sentence.Network_cn: 反叛者同时发动了几起攻击。

sentence.Network_en: The two simultaneous shots sounded like one.
sentence.Network_cn: 那同时发出的两声枪响听起来像是一响.
我们需要一个同声翻译.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... simply 简单地 simultaneous 同时的 sin 罪恶.

专业音频术语 ... Simulate 模拟的 Simultaneous 同步，联立 Sine wave 正弦波.
商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... pilot 驾驶员 simultaneous 同时译员 publisher 出版人员.

list.abs: simultaneous out diffusion 同时向外扩散simultaneous transmission 同时传输singing 啸声
同声传译（simultaneous interpretation）（Simultaneous Interpretation），又称“同声翻译”、“同步口译”，是指翻译者同步而不间断地将所听到的源语言口译为目标语 …
同声传译，简称同传（simultaneous interpretation），又称同声翻译、同步口译。是译员在不打断讲话者演讲的情况下，不停地将其 …
信息词汇英语翻译(R-Z) ... simultaneous mode 同时处理方式 simultaneous operation 同时操作 simultaneous processing 同时处理.
公司、企业、外企、各职位英文对照 ... Sales Engineer 销售工程师 Simultaneous Interpreter 同声传译员 Sales Executive 销售主管.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: based on Latin simul 'at the same time', probably influenced by late Latin momentaneus

entry.tran: 同时发生的;同时出现的;同步的
entry.def: Things which are simultaneous happen or exist at the same time.

example.ex: ...the simultaneous release of the book and the album...
example.tran: 书和唱片专辑的同步发行

example.ex: The theatre will provide simultaneous translation in both English and Chinese.
example.tran: 剧院将提供英语和汉语的同声翻译。

means.word_mean: 1. occurring or operating at the same time;

stems_affixes.word_buile: simult相类似,一样+aneous……特征的→时间相同的
simultaneous[adj.同时的,同时存在的]+ly表副词→adv.同时地
simult相类似,一样+aneity表名词→n.同时发生,同时
extempore即席的,当场的+aneous多……的,……特征的→即席,当场
miscell=misc混淆+aneous多……的→adj.多种的,混杂的
simult类似+aneous多……的,……特征的→时间相同的
spont=spond+aneous多……的,……特征的→自内心的承诺

Sentence.sentence: If there was a greater coordination of technology transfer offices within regions and a simultaneous investment in the scale and functions of our graduate schools, universities could, and should, play a key role in positioning the UK for the next growth cycle.

means.word_mean: 同时发生的; 同时存在的, 同时发生（或进行）的；同步的

sentences.en: The two simultaneous shots sounded like one.
sentences.cn: 那同时发出的两声枪响听起来像是一响。
